caption.p: Electrochemical performance of full batteries with bare Zn||MnVO and PANZ @Zn||MnVO. A) Cyclic voltammetry of full batteries, scan rate 0.3 mV s −1. B) Rate performance of full batteries from 0.5 to 5 A g −1 based on the mass of MnVO. C) Capacity versus voltage curves at different current densities. D) Long‐term cycling performance of full batteries.
